thread.title: Tamil Nadu political crisis LIVE: Edappadi Palaniswami faces floor test at 11 am today | Zee News
thread.title_full: Tamil Nadu political crisis LIVE: Edappadi Palaniswami faces floor test at 11 am today | Zee News

title: Tamil Nadu political crisis LIVE: Edappadi Palaniswami faces floor test at 11 am today | Zee News
text:
Comment Pic courtsey: ANI 
Chennai: Newly sworn-in Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Edappadi K. Palaniswami will seek a vote of confidence in the Assembly on Saturday. 
Edappadi will be seeking the confidence after being asked by the Governor C Vidyasagar Rao to form the government in the state. 
Former Chief Minister O Panneerselvam, who revolted against VK Sasikala, is yet to reveal its card to prove the majority in the House today. 
Here are the live updates from the ongoing political crisis in the state Latest Updates 09:16 AM 
We have to safeguard our party, symbol and the Government, will work with Chinamma: AIADMK MLA leaves Kuvathur resort We have to safeguard our party, symbol and the Government. Will work with Chinamma: AIADMK MLA leaves Kuvathur resort #FloorTest pic.twitter.com/SimJ54eatj 
— ANI (@ANI_news) February 18, 2017 09:16 AM 
Whip issued for all party MLAs, we will vote accordingly: Thoppu N D Venkatachalam, AIADMK MLA leaves Kuvathur resort Whip issued for all party MLAs, we will vote accordingly: Thoppu N D Venkatachalam, AIADMK MLA leaves Kuvathur resort #FloorTest #TamilNadu pic.twitter.com/P72eFZHaY9 09:16 AM 
AIADMK party MLAs leaving Kuvathur's Golden Bay resort, will attend special session of the Tamil Nadu assembly AIADMK party MLAs leaving Kuvathur's Golden Bay resort, will attend special session of the Tamil Nadu assembly #FloorTest pic.twitter.com/R8myWTH8BZ 
— ANI (@ANI_news) February 18, 2017 09:14 AM 
Security beefed up at Golden Bay resort in Kuvathur where AIADMK MLAs are staying. The MLAs will leave for state assembly to attend special session #TamilNadu : Security at Golden Bay resort in Kuvathur where AIADMK MLAs are staying,will leave for state assembly to attend special session pic.twitter.com/h87mLpMVij 
— ANI (@ANI_news) February 18, 2017 09:14 AM We pray for EPS, hope he sails through the floor test & establishes Amma's rule in the state: School student outside Kuvathur resort pic.twitter.com/XJ5v5FtgbW 
— ANI (@ANI_news) February 18, 2017 09:13 AM 
School students gather outside Golden Bay resort in Kuvathur in support of Tamil Nadu CM Edappadi K Palaniswami who faces floor test today. 
"We pray for EPS, hope he sails through the floor test and establishes Amma’s rule in the state," says a student. School students gather outside Golden Bay resort in Kuvathur in support of Tamil Nadu CM Edappadi K Palaniswami who faces floor test today. pic.twitter.com/ZB8NYHbZvm 
— ANI (@ANI_news) February 18, 2017 09:12 AM 
Crucial floor test in the special session of Tamil Nadu Assembly to take place today at 11:am to decide the fate of Chief Minister Edappadi K Palaniswami First Published: Saturday, February 18, 2017 - 09:19
